summary: Extracted EINTR-safe I/O helpers from SocketHTTPClient.c to SocketUtil.h for codebase-wide reuse. Added socket_util_write_all_eintr() and socket_util_read_all_eintr() as static inline functions. Removed 38 lines of duplicated code and added comprehensive documentation.
test_results: 116/117 tests passing (1 pre-existing DNS memory leak unrelated to changes)
